Package ch.framedev.metarapp.util

Class Changelog

java.lang.Object
ch.framedev.metarapp.util.Changelog
public class Changelog extends Object
Represents a changelog for a software release. This class contains information about version, release date, performance fixes, bug fixes, and new features.
